item.title: LSI INDUSTRIES INC 10-K
item.description: LSI INDUSTRIES INC, which is in the Electric Lighting & Wiring Equipment [3640] industry, SEC 10-K filing on September 09, 2022 had 19105 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations.
